#Instalar pacotes
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyterra)
library(geobr)
library(elevatr)
library(terra)
library(sf)
library(ggspatial)
library(mapview)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(devtools)
```

```{r}
volc <- read_xlsx("./Arquivos/volcano.xlsx") %>% 
  as_tibble()

volc %>% 
  mutate(X=longitude,
         Y=latitude) %>%                                                        #mutate - criar coluna X e Y como long/lat
   st_as_sf(coords=c("longitude","latitude"),
           crs= 4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 3857) %>%                                                #transform epsg -> wgs
  dplyr::select(X,Y,major_rock_1,primary_volcano_type,tectonic_settings) %>%
  mapview(zcol="major_rock_1")
  #ggplot()+
  #geom_sf(data=volc)+
  #geom_sf(data=africa)
```
